consumerRights.title: Your Consumer Rights
consumerRights.intro: Know your rights under the Law on Consumer Protection in Kosovo (No. 06/L-034).

safety.title: Right to Safety
safety.description: Protection against products and services that are hazardous to life and health.

information.title: Right to Information
information.description: Access to clear, accurate, and truthful information about goods and services.

redress.title: Right to Redress
redress.description: Compensation for faulty goods, including repair, replacement, or refund.

representation.title: Right to Representation
representation.description: The right to form and join consumer associations to protect collective interests.

choice.title: Right to Choice
choice.description: The ability to choose from a range of products and services at competitive prices.

education.title: Right to Education
education.description: Access to programs and information that help you make informed decisions.
